casebody.data:
COMMISSIONER OF PUBLIC HEALTH
v.
Anthony P. COLANDREA Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 8, 2017

Matthew D. Paradisi, in support of the petition.

Susan Castonguay, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn.App. 254, 167 A.3d 471 (2017), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
